version_description:
2.8.10
* More Improvements to increments. some users were experiencing exercises not auto-incrementing. This should fix that. If the app doesn't add weight after updating, check that you're increments are on in settings - workout - tap an exercise - increments. After that restart the app by double tapping the home button, sliding StrongLifts up, and starting StrongLifts. After that the app will add weight normally.
* Improvements to Weight Unit Setting not syncing
* General stability and bug fixes

Any issues or questions, contact us through the app - menu - help (or email support@stronglifts.com). If you like the app, please rate it 5 stars so more people find it.- Mehdi

2.8.11
* Improvements to Plates settings syncing
* Improvements to Weight Unit Setting not syncing
* Improvements to Sets & Reps settings syncing
* Improvements to Bar Weights settings syncing
* General stability and bug fixes

Any issues or questions, contact us through the app - menu - help (or email support@stronglifts.com). If you like the app, please rate it 5 stars so more people find it.- Mehdi

- Updated design for upcoming iPhone X
- Editing exercises from the log workout screen was causing issues for some users. We've temporarily removed the tool icon to edit workouts. Please edit your workout from settings - workout instead.
- Some people's custom settings for bar weight, plates and sets & reps kept getting reset. This should now be fixed.
- And we did the usual stability fixes and improvements.

Any issues, questions or feedback, contact us through the app - settings - help - contact us (or email support@stronglifts.com). If you like StrongLifts, please rate it 5 stars on the app store so more people find it.- Mehdi

Thanks for using StrongLifts! We continue to improve to help you build strength and muscle faster in the gym. In this version:
- Various stability improvements. The app was freezing for some users when changing increments. This should now longer happen. Please check your increments in settings - workout - tap an exercise - increments.
- Settings for sets & reps should also save properly now.
- Plus small UI improvements

Any issues, questions or suggestions, contact us through the app - settings - help - contact us (or email support@stronglifts.com). If you like StrongLifts, please rate it 5 stars on the app store so more people find it.- Mehdi

Thanks for using StrongLifts! We continue to improve the app to help you build strength and muscle faster in the gym. In this version:
- Fixed sets/reps and other settings not saving. We went sherlock on this, and finally found the cause. Double-check your settings, and set them properly. The app will remember them now.

Any issues, questions or suggestions, contact us through the app - settings - help - contact us (or email support@stronglifts.com). If you like StrongLifts, please rate it 5 stars on the app store so more people find it.- Mehdi

Thanks for using StrongLifts! We continue to improve the app to help you build strength and muscle faster in the gym. In this version we improved how ongoing workouts are triggered, and optimized synchronization with Apple Health.

Issues, questions or suggestions?
- Contact us through the app - settings - help - contact us; or
- Email us at support@stronglifts.com

Thanks for using StrongLifts! Since we've released StrongLifts Pro we've been working on improving the stability and usability of the app. We're not done yet and still have a while to go, so please bear with us. Once finished, we'll be able to release new features like Apple Watch faster. Right now we're like deloading before going for the next PR.

[2.9.15]
## Changed
• A/B button no longer shows for done workouts, only new/ongoing
• A/B button now requires a confirmation on every tap to avoid tapping by mistake (some people were complaining about lost sets, not a bug but a feature)
• A/B button popup message reminds you one workout per day max. Hopefully people who don't read the StrongLifts 5x5 guide will now stop trying to do two workouts in a row...
• Changing the workout date to a date where you already logged a workout is no longer possible, to avoid duplicate workouts.

## Fixed
• Fixed StrongLifts Pro features not immediately available after unlock in some cases. Manual restore is now longer needed, it will work right away.
• Fixed StrongLifts Pro not working cross-platform for certain users (contact us if you're still having that issue after this update, you might need a manual fix)

[2.9.14]
## Fixed
• Fixed some purchases not working if you had multiple purchases, including legacy ones (Power Pack, individual features). Again, we won't block previous purchases, even if you don't upgrade to StrongLifts Pro. Really.
• Fixed purchase recovery screen freezing in some cases
• Fixed several issues that were causing the app to crash. We're at over 99.82% crash-free sessions now.

## Issues, questions or suggestions?
• Please read the workout guide - https://stronglifts.com/5x5/
• Please read our FAQ - https://support.stronglifts.com/
• Contact from the app - settings - about - contact / support@stronglifts.com

## Like StrongLifts?
• Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it

Thanks for using StrongLifts! We're finally releasing v2.10 to the public. Many months have gone into rebuilding foundational parts of the app from scratch. While there are no new features in this version, the work done will make it easier to add features in the future.

Fixed
• Too many things to list. Check any issue you may have had in the past, we probably fixed it.

Changed
• Graphs have been rebuilt from scratch - load super fast, and several UX improvements.
• Weight progression logic rebuilt from scratch, now works reliably
• Apple Health rebuilt from scratch, now syncs consistently
• All kinds of UX improvements and fixes based on feedback
• App works much faster, and crash-free rate is +99.9%

Next
• Apple Watch will be available in the coming weeks. Contact us for early beta-access

Issues, questions or suggestions?
• Please read the workout guide - https://stronglifts.com/5x5/
• Please read our FAQ - https://support.stronglifts.com/
• Contact from the app - settings - about - contact / support@stronglifts.com

Like StrongLifts?
• Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it

Thanks for using StrongLifts! In this version we're introducing several updates to the Graphs to make it easier to review your progress and increase motivation. We've also fixed some minor reported issues. Here's what's new in this version:

Added
• Graph: Peak value for given time interval shows so you can quickly see your best weight lifted
• Graph: Gain value shows how much stronger you became for the given time period

Changed
• Graph: Dynamic Y-axis so you can better see changes in weight, esp body-weight

Fixed
• Crashes: fixed some minor issues causing crashes during 2.10 update for some StrongLifters

Coming Soon
• Apple Watch: track your complete StrongLifts workout from your Watch, without using your iPhone

Issues, questions or suggestions?
• Please read the workout guide - https://stronglifts.com/5x5/
• Please read our FAQ - https://support.stronglifts.com/
• Contact from the app - settings - about - contact / support@stronglifts.com

Like StrongLifts?
• Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it

Thanks for using StrongLifts! In this version we're fixing minor issues reported by StrongLifters. Here's what's new in this version:

Fixed
• Crash during app launch on iOS13 beta
• Last SQ/DL warmup set was sometimes slightly too light/heavy

Changed
• Graph Peak value now shows decimals when using kg
• Graphs - various usability improvements based on feedback

Coming Soon
• Apple Watch: track your full StrongLifts workout from your Watch, without using iPhone

Issues, questions or suggestions?
• Please read the workout guide - https://stronglifts.com/5x5/
• Please read our FAQ - https://support.stronglifts.com/
• Contact from the app - settings - about - contact / support@stronglifts.com

Like StrongLifts?
• Please rate the app 5 stars so more people find it

Thanks for using StrongLifts! In this release we're fixing minor issues causing the app to crash on iOS13 beta. Here's what's new in this version:

Fixed
• Crashes when logging/reviewing workouts on iOS13 beta
• Crashes when watching StrongLifts Workout videos on iOS13 beta

Coming Soon
• Apple Watch: track your full StrongLifts workout from your Watch, without using iPhone
• Apple Signin: cloud backup of your workout data without dealing with Facebook/Google

Thanks for using StrongLifts! We're continuing to improve Apple Watch based on feedback of StrongLifters like you. Logging workouts from the Apple Watch works great. But you may experience sync issues when using an Apple Watch and iPhone at the same time - we're working on improving this. For now here's what's new in this version:

Fixed
• Watch not always launching workout mode
• Watch not always syncing with apple activity/heart rate
• Watch timer randomly disappearing or closing iPhone timer
• Watch ghost notifications when closing the timer prematurely
• Watch auto-redirect to next exercise all sets done
• Watch weight per side ignored custom bar weight
• Watch sync with iPhone, further improvements
• Watch Series 5 small design improvements
• Duplicate next workout

Please check that any issue you may have had are now fixed.

If you find any issue, let us know asap
• Contact us through the app - settings - help - about us (preferred method, setup apple mail for this to work)
• Or, email us at support@stronglifts.com

Thanks for using StrongLifts! Big updates to the change weight screen, plate calculator, and set/reps! Here's what's new:

New
• Sets/reps: you can now do the set/reps you want for ANY exercise, including main ones. So 5x5 Deadlift, 3x10 Squat or 5x3 Bench is now possible (Pro feature)
• Plate Calculator: redesigned from scratch. It's now even easier to see which plates to add on the bar to save yourself doing math (Pro feature).
• Change weight: redesigned from scratch. All settings like bar weight, increments, set/reps and plates are now accessible from here.

• Fixed random Facebook login reconnect prompts

Thanks for using StrongLifts! More big updates in this release - you can now create your own custom workout A/B. Here's what's new:

New
• PRO - Fully customize workout A/B. Tap “edit workout” in your workout.
• PRO - Remove/replace any exercise. Ex: Replace Squats by Deadlifts.
• PRO - Reorder any exercise. Ex: start workout A with Bench vs Squat.
• PRO - New exercise list: pick from 74 exercises to set in your workout.
• Workout schedule. Set your workout days in homescreen - edit

Changed
• Homescreen shows next 3 workouts (done workouts show in history)
• Workout date - change this in workout - edit workout - workout date
• Removed settings - workout (edit from log workout - edit workout )
• Removed settings - equipment (edit from log workout - tap weight - plates/bar)
• Plus various minor design and usability improvements.

Fixed
• Fixed calendar not showing workouts started one day but ended the next one

Thanks for using StrongLifts! In v3.0: fresh look and custom rest timers! Here's what's new:

New
• Updated design of home screen, workout, warmup, timer, history, and apple watch.
• Timer: set custom rest periods for successful/failed sets (settings - timer).
• Log workout: goal reps show inside set circles, failed sets have lighter tint.
• Log workout: weight shows under rep circles if weight differs on some sets (ex: 1x3).
• History: massive speed optimizations, loads hundreds of workouts super fast now
• Apple Watch: timer shows which set you're on, next workout can be logged right after last one

Changed
• Workout screen no longer shows what you'll lift next workout after you've entered all the sets. Please use the homescreen to check what you'll lift in your next workout.
• Timer no longer rings at 1:30min and 3min after a successful set. It will ring at 3min only (5mins after a failed set). You can control the rest time period in the settings.

Fix
• Fixed duplicate exercises in workout and exercise list
